title: Facebook : most popular game MAU 2019
summary: The Facebook most in the game MAU was Facebook Candy_Crush_Saga , who made 10 active .
The most most Facebook was Subway_Surfers , with just 5 active .

In second place was Facebook 8_Ball_Pool with 10 active ; third place went to Facebook Texas_Holdem_Poker with 10 active ; fourth place went to Facebook Coin_Master with 5 active and fifth place went to Facebook Farm_Heroes_Saga , who made 10 active .
gold: This statistic lists the most popular Facebook games , based on monthly active users . As of August 2019 , Candy Crush Saga had approximately ten million monthly active users on Facebook . Fifth-ranked Subway Surfers had five million MAU in the same period .
